doc_context:
path /v3/blockchain/sc/custodial/approve
opid approvetransfercustodialwallet
params None
sum approve the transfer of an asset from a gas pump address
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
chain
desc the blockchain to work with
enum
bsc
eth
klay
matic
one
xdc
type string
custodialaddress
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc the gas pump address that holds the asset
type string
spender
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc the blockchain address to allow the transfer of the asset from the gas pump address
type string
contracttype
type number
desc the type of the asset to transfer set 0 for fungible tokens erc20 or equivalent 1 for nfts erc721 or equivalent or 2 for multi tokens erc1155 or equivalent
enum
0
1
2
tokenaddress
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc the address of the asset to transfer
type string
amount
desc only if the asset is a fungible token or multi token the amount of the asset to transfer do not use if the asset is an nft
pattern ddd
type string
tokenid
desc only if the asset is a multi token or nft the id of the token to transfer do not use if the asset is a fungible token
type string
maxlength 256
fromprivatekey
type string
maxlength 66
minlength 66
desc the private key of the blockchain address that owns the gas pump address master address
nonce
type number
desc the nonce to be set to the transfer transaction if not present the last known nonce will be used
fee
desc the custom defined fee if not present will be calculated automatically
type object
required
gaslimit
gasprice
props
gasprice
type string
desc the price for one gas unit in gwei
pattern d
gaslimit

desc the maximum number of gas units that you are willing to spend on processing the transaction at the provided gas price
